divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend wear at the park playing soccer she notice some thing in the sky behind me a flashed of light in the sky I turned around and there it was right there in front of me about 60 feet away FLOATING SLOW TOWARDS THE EAST IT REFLECTED Off OF OF THE SUN ONCE AND THEN AGAIN then 2 to 3 more times after that it look like an Orb shape and moved very smooth I could see the glow around it the energy it carried it flashed a reflection off of the sun like if on purpose like it was trying to be seen.My girlfriend turned away with fear and did not want to be apart of this .
Summary: Silver color it reflected of of the sun about 5 times it was shiny and moving slow.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around June 12th 2013
